DOC.brief_title: Survival Of Subjects With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.detailed_description: A multicenter , randomize , double-blind , parallel group , placebo control study investigate effect salmeterol/fluticasone 50/500mcg bd , salmeterol 50mcg bd , fluticasone 500mcg bd , deliver via DISKUS/ACCUHALER inhaler , survival subject chronic obstructive pulmonary disease 3 year treatment .

DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients COPD FEV1 < 60 % predict normal baseline ( prebronchodilator ) FEV1/FVC ratio < 70 % . Current exsmokers smoke history least 10 packyears . Exclusion criterion : Diagnosis respiratory disorder ( include asthma ) . Requirement long term oxygen therapy .
